creator: rdg@gaushell.net
text:
I'm running Solaris 8 x86, JDK1.2.  Tomcat 3.2, Apache 1.3 works fine.  I just 
installed Tomcat 4.0.1 and it dumps core out of the box.  I can provide a core 
dump to anyone who's interested (it's 18MB).  I'm not sure what's going on, but 
if I can help in any way, pls let me know.

Here's the stack trace from catalina.out:

I have experienced this same problem when using JDK 1.2.1 on Solaris sparc as 
well. The problem, I believe, is a bug in the JDK and/or its JIT compiler.

A workaround is to upgrade to JDK 1.2.2 as Tomcat 4.x appears to work OK under 
that JDK version. You can also run JDK 1.3 as well.
